meanings.sent1: She will empt the trash bin before it overflows.
meanings.sent2: Please empt the cup before putting it in the dishwasher.
meanings.sent3: The magician will empt the hat and reveal a surprise inside.
meanings.sent4: His departure will empt the room of laughter and joy.
meanings.sent5: The storm will empt the streets of people, leaving them deserted.

meanings.sent1: The closet had an empt where the shoes used to be.
meanings.sent2: He placed the book back on the shelf in the empt.
meanings.sent3: The child pretended the box was a spaceship, flying through the empt of space.
meanings.sent4: The empt in her heart was filled with love and kindness.
meanings.sent5: The empt in the jar made it perfect for storing small treasures.
